solution_line_template: Half the cans collected by Martha is {martha_cans}/{half_divisor} = <<{martha_cans}/{half_divisor}={half_martha_cans}>>{half_martha_cans}
Martha and Diego collected {martha_cans} + {diego_cans} = <<{martha_cans}+{diego_cans}={total_collected_by_martha_diego}>>{total_collected_by_martha_diego} cans together.
Thus, they need to collect {project_goal} - {total_collected_by_martha_diego} = <<{project_goal}-{total_collected_by_martha_diego}={cans_needed}>>{cans_needed} more cans.
